page.title: 04DUNHAM MASSEY_October/April.
page.content: At the end of October the house is closed to the public to be cleaned.There is a butler,a house keeper,Mrs Duckworth and four cleaning staff who look after the house during the whole year. Every piece of china is cleaned in both the rooms that are open to the public and in ones that are not. And there are over one hundred rooms in the house. The silver takes over two weeks to clean,it is done by first dipping the silver in cold water and then it is cleaned.Only beexwax polish is used on the furniture as it was when the 10th Earl of Stamford was alive. All the chandaliers have to be cleaned there are about four hundred pieces on each one,and this takes a long time. When the house is being cleaned,large covers are put over the furniture,they
